alert.note: Alert for Banks; Jackson; Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Banks, Jackson and northwestern Madison Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Jefferson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, pea sized hail, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Commerce, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Ila, Talmo, Peach State Speedway, Apple Valley and Banks Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
